entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 9:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -27.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
